nrccMessages.message: Some lifts are out of order between platforms 1 and 2 and the subway at Cardiff Central. Step-free access is still available to these platforms using the alternate lifts.
The lifts are out of order between platforms 6 and 7 and the walkway at Cardiff Central station.
Trains running between London Paddington and Heathrow Airport / Reading may be cancelled, revised or delayed by up to 30 minutes. Latest information can be found in Status and Disruptions.
